Functions
initializeSatelliteSelectorIfNotInitialized
function initializeSatelliteSelectorIfNotInitialized()

checks if the satellite selector is initialized and initializes it if it is not the case

setSelectedSatellites
function setSelectedSatellites(
sat_indices,
value
)

sets the selection of the given satellites to the given value, calculates the number of satellites that changed state

Parameters
sat_indices

array of satellite indices

value

boolean, the new value

Returns

the number of satellites that changed state

setAllSatellites
function setAllSatellites(
value,
update_search= true
)

sets all satellites to the given value

Parameters
value

boolean, the value all satellites will be set to

update_search

default: true, whether the search should be updated

addAllSatellites
function addAllSatellites()

adds all satellites to the selection

removeAllSatellites
function removeAllSatellites()

removes all satellites from the selection

toggleSelectedSatellites
function toggleSelectedSatellites(
sat_indices,
update_search= true
)

toggles the selection of the given satellites

Parameters
sat_indices

array of satellite indices

update_search

default: true, whether the search should be updated

removeSelectedSatellites
function removeSelectedSatellites(
sat_indices,
update_search= true
)

removes the given satellites from the selection

Parameters
sat_indices

array of satellite indices

update_search

default: true, whether the search should be updated

clearSatelliteSelections

clears the satellite selection

Parameters
update_search

default: true, whether the search should be updated

updateSatellitesCount
function updateSatellitesCount()

updates the displayed number of selected satellites

areAllSatellitesSelected
function areAllSatellitesSelected(
sat_indices
)

checks if all given satellites are selected

Parameters
sat_indices

array of satellite indices

Returns

boolean, whether all given satellites are selected

getSatellitesByDistanceRange
function getSatellitesByDistanceRange(
disMinIncl,
disMaxExcl
)
Parameters
disMinIncl

the minimum distance for selection (inclusive)

disMaxExcl

the maximum distance for selection (exclusive)

Returns

a list with the indexes of the satellites that currently have a distance in the range [disMinIncl, disMaxExcl)

getSatellitesByAltitudeRange
function getSatellitesByAltitudeRange(
altMinIncl,
altMaxExcl
)
Parameters
altMinIncl

the minimum altitude for selection (inclusive)

altMaxExcl

the maximum altitude for selection (exclusive)

Returns

a list with the indexes of the satellites that currently have an altitude in the range [altMinIncl, altMaxExcl)

getSatellitesByType
function getSatellitesByTypes(
types
)
Parameters
types

a list with the types for selection

Returns

a list with the indexes of the satellites that have one of the types in the input array 'types'

setSelectionByDistanceRange
function setSelectionByDistanceRange(
disMinIncl,
disMaxExcl,
value
)

sets the satellites selection based on whether their current distance falls in a given range

Parameters
disMinIncl

the minimum distance for selection (inclusive)

disMaxExcl

the maximum distance for selection (exclusive)

value

a boolean indicating what value to set

setSelectionByAltitudeRange
function setSelectionByAltitudeRange(
altMinIncl,
altMaxExcl,
value
)

sets the satellites selection based on whether their current altitude falls in a given range

Parameters
altMinIncl

the minimum altitude for selection (inclusive)

altMaxExcl

the maximum altitude for selection (exclusive)

value

a boolean indicating what value to set

setSelectionByTypes
function setSelectionByTypes(
types,
value
)

sets the satellites selection based on their type

Parameters
types

a list with the types for selection

value

a boolean indicating what value to set
